name: rotating-theme
description: An extension that rotates your IDE theme

rotatingTheme.themeFolder.description: Absolute path to a folder containing JSON palette files. Files are read and rotated in alphabetical order.

rotatingTheme.transitionDurationMs.description: How long to fade from one palette to the next (milliseconds).

rotatingTheme.transitionSteps.description: Number of steps within each fade. More steps = smoother but more updates.

rotatingTheme.dwellMs.description: How long to sit on a palette before starting the next fade (milliseconds).

rotatingTheme.keysWhitelist.description: Optional list of color keys to animate (e.g. ["activityBar.background", "editor.background"]). Leave empty to animate all keys found.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
